from card_pdf_parser.parser.extract import extract_lines_lr_order
import re

# Test fatura fevereiro.pdf
lines = extract_lines_lr_order\(''fatura fevereiro.pdf''\)

# Find lines that look like they contain card headers \(with ''final'' and 4 digits\)
print\(''=== Lines containing ""final"" in fatura fevereiro.pdf ===''\)
for i, line in enumerate\(lines[:150]\):
    if ''final'' in line.lower\(\) or ''FINAL'' in line:
        print\(f''{i}: {repr\(line\)}''\)")
